definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: It is good for a man that he bear the yoke in his youth.
sentences.chinese: 人在幼年负轭，这原是好的。

sentences.english: Do not be yoked together with unbelievers.
sentences.chinese: 不要与不信的人同伍，共负一轭。

sentences.english: The rhombic drive mechanism has two "yokes" .
sentences.chinese: 菱形驱动机构有两个“轭”。

sentences.english: A pair of oxen, yoked together was used in the plough.
sentences.chinese: 两头牛被轭套在一起用于耕犁。

sentences.english: What of the ox who loves his yoke and deems the elk and deer of the forest stray and vagrant things?
sentences.chinese: 对喜欢挽轭，视林中康鹿为迷途流浪者的公牛呢？

sentences.english: The farmer continued solidly yoking his oxen.
sentences.chinese: 农夫继续不动声色地给牛驾轭。

sentences.english: He yoked the oxen to the plough.
Scotch yoke mechanism is the key part in the quadro-flex compressor.
sentences.chinese: 止转轭机构是十字滑块压缩机中最关键的部件。

sentences.english: Their heritage from generation to generation is the belled yoke and the lash.
sentences.chinese: 它们一代代继承的遗产就是带铃的轭与鞭子。

sentences.english: The defeated army passed under the yoke.
It sat on top of a small flatbed with wooden wheels, drawn by the yoked oxen from the field.
sentences.chinese: 灵柩被安置在木轮的平板车上，由上了轭的水牛拉着。

sentences.english: The magnetic path of electromagnetic yoke was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 对电磁轭的磁路进行了分析。

sentences.english: For now will I break his yoke from off thee, and will burst thy bonds in sunder.
sentences.chinese: 现在我必从你颈项上折断他的轭，扭开他的绳索。

sentences.english: When a believer is unequally yoked with a non-believer, their different values are in conflict.
sentences.chinese: 倘若信与不信之人同负一轭，两人的价值必生矛盾。

sentences.english: In the year one hundred and seventy the yoke of the Gentiles was taken off from Israel.
sentences.chinese: 一百七十年，异民的重轭，由以色列人身上解除了。

definition: to pull a carriage (of draft animal)
load carried by a pack animal
